content: magic coffee baby hat designed by tracey kay when two women in our sunday sock knitting group got pregnant at the same time we naturally suspected the magic coffee at the café where we meet many knitters immediately switched from coffee to tea here is the pattern for the stripey hats that i made for the magic coffee babies this easy pattern comes in four sizes for newborns and babies up to 3 years old special features include twisted ribbing and an i-cord loop on top hat size newborn 0-6 weeks hat size baby 2-9 months on julian 5 weeks 9 75 lb 15 head circumference on newbie 5 weeks 12 lbs 15 5 head circumference hat size baby 9-18 months on scooter and zoom 10 months 14 25 lbs 16 75 head circumference teekay knits august 2011 ver 1 0 page 1/2 magic coffee baby hat designed by tracey kay abbreviations mc - main color cc - contrasting color k - knit p - purl ktbl - knit through the back loop k2tog - knit 2 stitches together pm - place marker sizes/approximate age ranges newborn 0-6 weeks baby sm - slip marker 2-9 months baby 9-18 months toddler 18 months-3 years round s - round s actual measurements 11 13 14 5 16 around 5 5 5 i-cord - with all stitches on one dpn *slide 6 25 7 high stretches to fit a larger head stitches to the right of needle without turning work knit all stitches* repeat gauge 5 stitches and 7 5 row per inch in stockinette to desired length needles 5 double pointed needles dpns at size to get gauge ~4 5mm/us7 16 circular can be used for ribbing and body tips from tracey of hat for larger sizes longer circular can be used for all sizes sizing babies come in all shapes and sizes if using magic-loop technique you re not sure err on the big side it ll fit yarn mc 35 40 45 55 yards and cc 25 30 35 45 yards of eventually worsted weight yarn preferably machine washable 25 30 cast-on i prefer the old norwegian cast-on see 35 45 grams total i used karabella aurora 8 and plymouth http //www knittinghelp com/video/play/germa yarn worsted merino superwash solids n-twisted-cast-on which is a stretchy variation of the standard long-tail cast-on instructions ribbing the twisted ribbing ktbl2 p2 is tighter cast-on 56 64 72 80 using a stretchy cast-on method join to than the standard k2p2 ribbing if you prefer knit in the round without twisting and pm k2p2 ribbing use one size smaller needles for the ribbing ribbing 6 rounds in mc of *ktbl2 p2* repeat around color changes the color change will result in a hat *knit 2 rounds in cc knit 2 rounds in mc* repeat until hat jog in color at the end of round personally measures 3 5 4 4 5 5 inches from cast-on edge i m ok with that jogging is good for you
